hadiths.text: Anas bin Malik said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Whoever sends salah upon me once, Allah (SWT) will send salah upon him tenfold, and will erase ten sins from him, and will raise him ten degrees in status

chapter.ara-name: باب الْفَضْلِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ عَلَى النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: The virtue of sending salah upon the Prophet (ﷺ)
